scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist && cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --only=prod && zip -r ../flixit-lambda.zip ./* -x "package.json" "package-lock.json" && cd ..
scripts.deploy: aws --endpoint-url http://127.0.0.1:4566 lambda update-function-code --function-name flixit-lambda --zip-file fileb://flixit-lambda.zip
scripts.start: aws --endpoint-url http://127.0.0.1:4566 lambda invoke --function-name flixit-lambda --payload '{}' output.txt
